about: I'm a BS/MS Computer Science student at UIUC (Dean’s List, James Scholar) passionate about high-performance systems, low-latency infrastructure, and machine learning. I’ve interned at Sony/PlayStation building microservices, ML pipelines, and streaming analysis tools, and currently work at SquareKettle designing low-latency trading systems and market-making strategies. My projects span protocol-level encoders, compression engines, and real-time LLM tools. I placed in the top 3% globally (3rd in Korea) in IMC Prosperity and was a finalist in Akuna Capital's Options 201 program.

education.details: Dean’s List, James Scholar, GPA: 3.82/4.00. Relevant coursework: Distributed Systems, Programming Languages and Compilers, Discrete Structures, Statistics for CS, Data Structures and Algorithms, Computer Architecture, Numerical Methods, High-Frequency Trading Technology, Applied Machine Learning, Algorithms, Database Systems, System Programming.

experience.summary: Built Spring Boot microservices with WebSocket middleware, developed .NET Core music analysis service, and engineered ML pipeline for audio feature extraction. Deployed systems using Docker and Kubernetes.
Designed low-latency data pipelines in C++/Python for high-frequency trading feeds and contributed to cross-asset options strategies using statistical signals and volatility surfaces.
Designed market-making algorithm using fair value estimation and order book imbalance tracking; placed in top 3% globally and 3rd in Korea based on PnL.

projects.name: CBOE Binary Order Entry Protocol Encoder/Decoder
projects.description: C++ implementation of low-latency trading protocol encoder/decoder with sub-microsecond performance using zero-copy buffers and custom allocators.

projects.name: IEX Transport Protocol Compression
projects.description: Created a hybrid compression algorithm (Huffman + LZ77 + delta) in C++ with FUSE integration; achieved 70%+ size reduction and sub-ms latency.

projects.name: Mistral Chrome Extension
projects.description: Built a Chrome extension that allows users to highlight text and get real-time, local LLM insights using the Mistral model and Ollama. Backend served by Flask; ensures full offline inference with no third-party API calls.

projects.name: Modal and Nodal
projects.description: Built a Rust-based high-speed web scraper and parser for jazz musician discographies; structured data in MongoDB to support scalable musicology analysis.

projects.name: SoccerMatchPro
projects.description: Developed a full-stack Flask web app to visualize a soccer match prediction model. Achieved 75% accuracy with a random forest ML pipeline; inducted into the project Hall of Fame for excellence in predictive performance and UI design.

extra: Finalist – Akuna Options 201 (Top Performer, Final-Round Interview)
Dean’s List, James Scholar at UIUC
Interested in low-latency trading systems and real-time architecture
